Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerHandler
public class PlayerHandler extends Object
The PlayerHandler class manages the players in the game and their turns.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerHandler

      public PlayerHandler()
      Constructs a PlayerHandler object.

  • Method Details

    • choseFirstPlayer

      public void choseFirstPlayer()
      Chooses the first player randomly.

    • checkName

      public boolean checkName(String name)
      Checks if a name is available for a new player.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if the name is available, false otherwise

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the game. The player is marked as ACTIVE.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to add

    • playerLeave

      public void playerLeave(String id, GameState gameState)
      Removes a player from the game. If the game isn't started yet, the player is remove from the player list, otherwise is marked as INACTIVE.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player that left the game.
      gameState - the state of gameplay

    • playerDisconnect

      public void playerDisconnect(String id, GameState gameState)
      Handle the disconnection of a player. The player is marked as DISCONNECTED.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player that disconnected.
      gameState - the state of gameplay

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String id)
      Handle the reconnection of a player. The player is marked as ACTIVE.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player that reconnected.

    • makeFinalClassification

      public String makeFinalClassification()
      Calculates the final standings of players based on their points. If only one player is left, he is a the top of the standings, regardless of the points.
      Returns:
      the name of the player who won the game

    • current

      public Player current()
      Gets the current player in the turn.
      Returns:
      the current player object, or null if the current player isn't defined.

    • hasNext

      public boolean hasNext()
      Check if a current player is defined. If a current player is not defined the game isn't started yet or is already finished.
      Returns:
      'true' if a current player is defined, 'false' otherwise.

    • next

      public void next()
      If possible, advances the turn to the next player. If there aren't enough players avaiable, set current turn in a invalid state.

    • notifyLastRound

      public void notifyLastRound()
      Set that it is the last round of the game.

    • getLocal

      public LocalPlayerList getLocal()
      Gets the local player list representation of all players.
      Returns:
      the LocalPlayerList object containing the local player representations

    • getNumPlayersAvaiable

      public int getNumPlayersAvaiable()
      Gets the number of players available (not inactive) in the game.
      Returns:
      the number of players available

    • getNumPlayersConnected

      public int getNumPlayersConnected()
      Gets the number of players connected to the game.
      Returns:
      the number of players connected

    • getPlayerList

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayerList()
      Gets the list of players.
      Returns:
      the list of players

    • getNumPlayer

      public int getNumPlayer()
      Gets the number of players in the game.
      Returns:
      the number of players

    • getPlayerByID

      public Player getPlayerByID(String id)
      Gets a player based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player
      Returns:
      the player object with the corresponding ID, or null if not found

    • getPlayerIDByName

      public String getPlayerIDByName(String name)
      Gets the ID of a player based on their name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      Returns:
      the ID of the player with the corresponding name, or null if not found

    • setEventKeeper

      public void setEventKeeper(EventKeeper eventKeeper)
      Sets the event keeper for the listenable object.
      Parameters:
      eventKeeper - The EventKeeper instance to set.

    • notifyUpdate

      public void notifyUpdate()
      Notifies all listeners about the update of the listenable object.

    • notifyUpdateToID

      public void notifyUpdateToID(String id)
      Notifies a specific listener with the given ID about the update of the listenable object.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the listener to notify.

    • notifyEvent

      public void notifyEvent(Sendable sendable)
      Notifies all listeners with the given sendable event.
      Parameters:
      sendable - The sendable event to notify.

    • notifyEventToID

      public void notifyEventToID(String id, Sendable sendable)
      Notifies a specific listener with the given ID about the sendable event.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the listener to notify.
      sendable - The sendable event to notify.
